undergraduate.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science

earlyLife.childhood: The individual was raised in a major city in Texas and later moved to another city in Florida. Their mother was a teenager when they were born, and their biological father was a bike shop owner. The mother remarried a person who was a Cuban immigrant, who adopted the individual.
earlyLife.interests: From a young age, this individual showed an interest in technology and inventing, creating a science fair project that involved building a solar oven.

earlyCareer.description: The individual began their career on Wall Street, holding various positions at several firms.

founding.description: They founded an e-commerce platform originally as an online bookstore, which quickly expanded to sell a variety of products, becoming one of the largest in the world.

milestones.event: A major web services platform was launched.
The company became the most valuable retailer in the United States.
The company acquired a major grocery chain.

blueOrigin.description: Founded in 2000, this company is a private aerospace manufacturer and sub-orbital spaceflight services entity focused on making space travel affordable and accessible.

acquisition.description: The individual acquired a well-known newspaper, revitalizing it with digital innovations.

bezosExpedition.description: This is the individual's personal investment company, which has invested in various startups.

philanthropy.description: The individual has pledged significant amounts to charitable causes, including education and homelessness.

notableInitiatives.name: Fund G
notableInitiatives.description: Launched to fund organizations that help homeless families.

notableInitiatives.name: Fund H
notableInitiatives.description: Announced to combat climate change with a significant financial commitment.

netWorth.ranking: One of the richest individuals in the world
